Pre-Game Insights: India and Australia are set to meet in the T20 World Cup 2024 with a chance for India to avenge their home Cricket World Cup 2023 final loss against Australia.
India will aim to stay on top of Group 1 and potentially send Australia out of the tournament.
Australia will need to overcome one of the only two undefeated sides in the tournament.
Post-Match Reflections: Details about post-match reflections are not provided in the article.
Others: The match will take place at the Daren Sammy Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, Saint Lucia.
The match is scheduled for June 24, 2024, at 10:30am local time (14:30 GMT).
The pitch is expected to provide a potentially even-paced surface for a day game.
There's a high chance of rain in the hours leading up to the match and it could delay the start or interrupt the game.
